actionCalls.name: myRule_21_A1
actionCalls.label: Doc Ver. Accepted Notification to SO

actionCalls.name: myRule_24_A1
actionCalls.label: Doc Ver. Accepted Notification to Sales Head

Flow.description: Send internal notification when booking is approved or rejected by CRM or Audit team and change Unit, Opty and Booking status

value.stringValue: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED([Booking__c].Paid_Percentage__c ) ), TEXT([Booking__c].Stage_of_Booking__c) <> 'EOI', [Booking__c].Paid_Percentage__c < 0.02, TEXT([Booking__c].Status__c) <> 'Cancelled', TEXT([Booking__c].Status__c) <> 'Cancellation In Progress')

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Paid_Percentage__c} ) ), TEXT({!myVariable_current.Stage_of_Booking__c}) <> 'EOI', {!myVariable_current.Paid_Percentage__c} < 0.02, TEXT({!myVariable_current.Status__c}) <> 'Cancelled', TEXT({!myVariable_current.Status__c}) <> 'Cancellation In Progress')

Flow.label: Booking Processed Notification & Unit Status to be updated to Sold

recordUpdates.name: myRule_6_A1
recordUpdates.label: Update Stage of Booking & Qualification Date
